message: Welcome to Reignfall. In this world, a corrupt king is taking advantage of the citizens for his own benefit. You are a yound peasant who is aiming to strike the king down and create hope for the villagers, however, if you manage to perish along the way, hope will be lost. Are you ready to begin?

It is a peaceful day in your village, everyone is out enjoying the sun, but suddenly, the wheels of a carriage can be heard approaching the town, its the knights. Everyone but you scramble into their homes. A knight appraoches you.

options.message: You ask the knight why he has come to your village.

message: The knight looks down upon you with a disgusted look on his face. He demands that the village pay 60% of their profits on their recent harvest to the king as a tax.

options.message: You plead to the knight for the request to be reconsidered, as your village will not be able to afford supplies like firewood or food for the coming winter

message: The knight laughs at your request, and whispers to the other knight next to him who then returns to the carriage. Just as you think you are safe, the knight shouts 'I CAN SEE PLENTY OF FIREWOOD HERE!', as he throws a burning bottle towards a house. The other knights rush into the village with swords in hand.

options.message: You run away from the knights...

message: Knights begin invading homes, while setting other homes on fire. The village is now engulfed in flames and panic.

options.message: You spot some useful items through the smoke.

message: Through the smoke, you spot some items...
Would you like to take the defence potion as well?

options.message: You grab the small potion before leaving.
You decide not to risk staying longer.

message: The village burns around you. Time to escape!

options.message: You prepare to make your escape.
